content.raw:
Remove gazebo/math includes?

~~~
$ grep -r "gazebo/math" gazebo/msgs/
gazebo/msgs/msgs.hh:#include "gazebo/math/Quaternion.hh"
gazebo/msgs/msgs.hh:#include "gazebo/math/MathTypes.hh"
gazebo/msgs/msgs.hh:#include "gazebo/math/Vector3.hh"
gazebo/msgs/msgs.hh:#include "gazebo/math/Pose.hh"
gazebo/msgs/msgs.hh:#include "gazebo/math/Plane.hh"
~~~
content.html:
Remove gazebo/math includes?

$ grep -r "gazebo/math" gazebo/msgs/
gazebo/msgs/msgs.hh:#include "gazebo/math/Quaternion.hh"
gazebo/msgs/msgs.hh:#include "gazebo/math/MathTypes.hh"
gazebo/msgs/msgs.hh:#include "gazebo/math/Vector3.hh"
gazebo/msgs/msgs.hh:#include "gazebo/math/Pose.hh"
gazebo/msgs/msgs.hh:#include "gazebo/math/Plane.hh"
